enWisdom: An unremorseful sinner is the most ignorant person

Wisdom: أَجْهَلُ النَّاسِ الْمُغْتَرُّ بِقَوْلِ مَادِحٍ مُتَمَلِّقٍ يُحَسِّنُ لَهُ الْقَبِيحَ وَيُبَغِّضُ إِلَيْهِ النَّصِيحَ
enWisdom: The most ignorant person is one who is deceived by the praise of a flatterer who makes the ugly look appealing to him and makes him hate the [sincere] adviser

Wisdom: أَعْظَمُ الْجَهْلِ مُعَادَاةُ الْقَادِرِ وَمُصَادَقَةُ الْفَاجِرِ وَالثِّقَةُ بِالْغَادِرِ
enWisdom: The greatest ignorance is making enmity with the powerful, befriending the immoral and trusting the traitor

Wisdom: مَنِ اصْطَنَعَ جَاهِلًا بَرْهَنَ عَنْ وُفُورِ جَهْلِهِ
enWisdom: One who favours an ignorant person demonstrates the extent of his own ignorance

Wisdom: تَكَثُّرُكَ بِمَا لَا يَبْقَى لَكَ وَلَا تَبْقَى لَهُ مِنْ أَعْظَمِ الْجَهْلِ
enWisdom: Amassing that which does not last for you and for which you will not remain is from the greatest ignorance
